name: Seeker (early WIP)
description:
This is a very early work in progress. I want to get into the habit of working more openly and having more dialogue with players on my personal projects.

This is just a single area to play with the basic mechanics of the game so far.The next version will have things like a goal and restart menu on death.

Arrows to move and space to cast a platform.

It does work with an xbox360 controller, but doesn't always correctly identify the controller. (yay! bugs!)
